fees.description: Additional fees may apply, we'll endeavour to inform you of any fee that is to be applied and gain your consent before the service is provided. Information available at: koganenergy.com.au/terms-conditions
Disconnection fees may apply to manually de-energise a property. The fee will be passed on from your distributor and may vary.
Reconnection fees may apply to manually re-energise a property. The fee will be passed on from your distributor and may vary.

gasContract.terms: Kogan Energy is provided by Powershop Australia Pty Ltd. We offer bi-monthly bills and do not issue paper bills. We require a credit card or bank details. For further information in relation to Kogan Energy and this offer - see our full terms and conditions at: koganenergy.com.au/terms-conditions.
gasContract.variation: We may vary your prices at any time. If we vary your prices we'll give you advance notice, usually by email.

eligibility.information: To be eligible, you must be an existing Kogan First member or agree to Kogan First membership T&Cs, available at koganenergy.com.au/terms-conditions. If you’re no longer eligible for the offer, we can end your energy plan.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: This Kogan Energy offer is an ongoing contract (until you or we end it) with no exit fees.
